summary: Implemented a new document preview markup utility and updated DocumentContentPreview to tokenize text vs [FILE:id:name] markers and render text segments with inline spoiler/underline parsing. Added documentation/state files not requested in the BuildRequest. Due to truncation of the new renderer (renderTextSegment), some REQ-1 styling behaviors cannot be fully verified from the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated regression test plan documentation unrelated to the requested implementation changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to implement preview rendering changes in DocumentContentPreview; it does not request adding regression test plan docs.
BuildRequest does not request modifying project_state.json or adding feature request tracking entries.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated a generated/summary listing of frontend files.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request adding or modifying a file inventory/summary artifact.
